question: India recently set up a Water Centre led by IIT Guwahati, along with which country?
explanation:
Australia-India Water Centre (AIWC) has been recently inaugurated through a Webinar and will be led by University of Western Sydney, Australia and IIT Guwahati, India.
The Centre will also include 21 other partners from India and Australia. It will include collaboration in water research, joint masterâ€™s level programme in water futures, student and staff exchanges, workshops and training in water sector.
